info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 8:29AM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Neches River Near Diboll affecting Angelina, Trinity and Polk Counties.
For the Neches River...including Diboll...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Neches River near Diboll.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Expect flooded boat ramps and trails.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM CDT Tuesday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 830 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Angelina, TX; Polk, TX; Trinity, TX
